alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Grayson; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 9:27PM EDT until March 18 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Grayson County in central Kentucky... Southwestern Breckinridge County in central Kentucky... East central Ohio County in central Kentucky... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Hartford, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Grayson, southwestern Breckinridge and east central Ohio Counties, including the following locations... Horse Branch, Steff, Shreve, Tousey, Windy Hill, Caneyville, Do Stop, Pine Knob, Dogwalk and Jingo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
